PreToolUse.description: Pause before git push to review changes

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(md|txt)$ ]] && [[ ! "$file_path" =~ (README|CLAUDE|AGENTS|CONTRIBUTING)\.md$ ]]; then
  echo "[Hook] BLOCKED: Unnecessary documentation file" >&2
  echo "[Hook] File: $file_path" >&2
  exit 1
fi

echo "$input"

PreToolUse.description: Suggest manual compaction at logical intervals

SessionStart.description: Load previous context on new session

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command')

if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'gh pr create'; then
  output=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_output.output // ""')
  pr_url=$(echo "$output" | grep -oE 'https://github.com/[^/]+/[^/]+/pull/[0-9]+')
  
  if [ -n "$pr_url" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] PR created: $pr_url" >&2
    repo=$(echo "$pr_url" | sed -E 's|https://github.com/([^/]+/[^/]+)/pull/[0-9]+|\1|')
    pr_num=$(echo "$pr_url" | sed -E 's|.*/pull/([0-9]+)|\1|')
    echo "[Hook] To review: gh pr review $pr_num --repo $repo" >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  if command -v swiftformat >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    swiftformat "$file_path" --quiet 2>&1 | head -3 >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  print_stmts=$(grep -n "print(" "$file_path" 2>/dev/null | grep -v "#if DEBUG" | head -5 || true)
  
  if [ -n "$print_stmts" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] WARNING: print() in $file_path" >&2
    echo "$print_stmts" >&2
    echo "[Hook] Wrap in #if DEBUG before commit" >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)

if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then
  modified=$(git diff --name-only HEAD 2>/dev/null | grep -E '\.swift$' || true)
  
  if [ -n "$modified" ]; then
    while IFS= read -r file; do
      if [ -f "$file" ] && grep -q "print(" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then
        echo "[Hook] WARNING: print() in $file" >&2
      fi
    done <<< "$modified"
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

Stop.description: Final audit for print() in modified Swift files
